CdrDocCtl.DocTitle: [OBSOLETE] Filter to extract CDR citation IDs from summary document

CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<!-- $Id: CDR0000000039.xml,v 1.2 2002-07-01 15:50:45 bkline Exp $
Filter to extract CDR citation IDs from summary document.
$Log: not supported by cvs2svn $
-->
<xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="text"/>
<!-- Just process CitationReference elements --> <xsl:template match = '/'> <xsl:apply-templates select="//CitationReference"/> </xsl:template>
<!-- Expand citation references --> <xsl:template match="CitationReference"> <xsl:if test='string-length(@cdr:ref) > 3'> <xsl:value-of select='substring(@cdr:ref, 4)'/><xsl:text> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
